message.body: Oh I didn't see those texts until just now. I'm just gonna send checks directly to everest properties for summer rent to avoid dealing with it all in cas
h. You having fun in sd? :)
I thought you said you could transfer to emily..? I don't think it works like that, rent has to be paid all in kne
I contacted everest properties and they said they didn't need it to be paid all in one check. I'd just prefer paying my part myself without dealing with
Okay well you'll have to transfer her money regardless to pay for utilities and such, just letting you know
I asked about that too and I'm able to send my own checks for utilities over the summer. Emily can talk to me if she'd rather I do it differently
